title: HDMI Scaling In-game Resolution problem
body:
Hello, It's been a while since I played. I reinstalled league and i have been trying to get my resolution to work properly.
Basically I have to scale my monitor to %5 HDMI scaling in my Radeon display settings. 

When I load a game of league my resolution is NOT scaled and I lose about 2 inches off the border of my HUD

This is VERY F%^$ING FRUSTRATING. There is no settings for this and I would like to see my HUD please
please help

replies.body:
Hey there, your settings might be corrupt.  See if a config reset might help here:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Make sure that both in-game and native resolutions are not exceeding 1920x1080.  Let me know if that helps!
Have you tried running the game in Windowed Borderless mode? This scales the game to the size of your desktop.
If I don't get a response in the next 2 hours I am never playing this game again
